description: Don't like the feel of a latex gasket on a hot summer day? This breathable, paddling jacket uses Hydrus 2.5 fabric that has a soft hand and comfortable lining. The adjustable neoprene cinch collar is not completely waterproof (thus, it's semi-dry) but much more comfortable than a latex neck gasket. Wrist are waterproof latex under neoprene punch-through cuffs to keep water from shooting up your sleeves.Hydrus 2.5 fabric is waterproof, breathable and supple, with comfortable inner print lining.Adjustable neoprene cinch collar is highly water-resistant and more comfortable than a latex neck gasket.Waterproof latex wrist gaskets are protected by punch-through neoprene outer cuffs, and keep water out of your sleeves while paddling.Double tunnel forms a dry and secure interface with your sprayskirt tunnel.Dual hook and loop closures adjust for a comfortable fit around the waist.Zippered pocket on sleeve.
name: Kokatat Session Semi-Dry Jacket - Unisex
